text: @ProjectLincoln @kenolin1 The Trump WH & the Coronavirus Task Force have failed to coordinate & lead the most wealthy country in the World out of the this pandemic based on sheer incompetence & willful intent. The Task Force not taking a firm stand against the indoor Trump Rally with no masks is insane.
